Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Cicero, North Ave, Laramie and Grand: due to, street blockage near Armitage/Leclaire.
